description: A Spring Boot global exception handler class that manages common application errors and provides JSON-formatted HTTP responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A controller advice class that handles various exceptions globally in a Spring application.

methods.name: handleIllegalArgument
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentExceptions and returns a 400 Bad Request with the error message.

methods.name: handleUserNotFound
methods.description: Handles UsernameNotFoundExceptions and returns a 404 Not Found with the error message.

methods.name: handleBadCreds
methods.description: Handles BadCredentialsException and returns a 401 Unauthorized with a generic invalid credentials message.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException and returns a 400 Bad Request with the first validation error message.
